meanings.sent1: He butled for the wealthy family, ensuring their needs were met.
meanings.sent2: The man butled at the grand estate, attending to the guests with grace.
meanings.sent3: The butler butled so well that even the pets obeyed his commands.
meanings.sent4: She butled as if born to the role, commanding respect with every step.
meanings.sent5: The butler's butling was so impeccable, it became the talk of the town.

meanings.sent1: The young man butled for the first time, nervous but eager to learn.
meanings.sent2: She butled professionally, ensuring every detail was perfect for the event.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to butle by carrying a tiny tray, mimicking the butler's actions.
meanings.sent4: He butled with such precision, it was as if he had been trained for years.
meanings.sent5: Their friend butled for them during the dinner party, making everyone feel special.

meanings.definition: To perform the duties of a butler.
meanings.sent1: The butler butled diligently, polishing silverware and arranging flowers.
meanings.sent2: She butled with efficiency, ensuring the household ran smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The robot butled in the futuristic mansion, following its programmed butling routines.
meanings.sent4: He butled with a sense of pride, knowing his work was appreciated by the family.
meanings.sent5: The butler butled flawlessly, making the mansion feel like a five-star hotel.
